Articles.Content:
I have Tank. You don’t.

My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-09-24T16:43:34Z" title="09/24/2021 04:43  PM" data-short="2 yr">September 24, 2021</time> by Admiral Fluffy**
  
Oh hey llok new page

> 
> 
> 27 minutes ago, Admiral Fluffy said:
> 
> 
> I have Tank.
> 

"I have tunk".

tink-tank-tunk

Probably.

Tinkerballa Hill.

Nothing worse than getting hit in the Tunk.

Tinkerbell magically gave the hill to me.

**My Lost Boys Hill.**

Tinkerbell<Tank

My hill.

Sovereign class starship>tank.

**MY HILL.**

For a [double sovereign](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Double_sovereign) the hill becomes

Two Pound Hill

Rampant inflation causes a financial collapse of your hill.

I build a commune hill on the rubble.

**My chilled hippie hill.**

The hippies go to the astral.

Chilled Astral Hill.

The hippies arrive in Astralia and setTle at great big red solid rock hill.

**MY BIG RED HILL.**

The Big Red Hill appears to be a red giant and explodes.

White Dwarf Hill.

I gather every **White Dwarf** ever printed and pile them on your white dwarf and roll 100 D6 which all come up six proclaiming that this new hill is mine.

It starts with one....  
  
![Excerpt from Dice Men: Games Workshop 1975 to 1985 by Ian ...](https://external-content.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=https%3A%2F%2Fs3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com%2Fmedia.unbound.co%2Fdownload%2Fbooks%2Fgames-workshop%2F3%2B%25E2%2580%2593White_Dwarf_1.jpg&f=1&nofb=1)

I roll a one sided die.

It gets a 1, which means **my hill.**

1-sided die hills die.

Zero-Sided Hill

...stops existing because there's nothing of it to exist. I build a new hill.

**MY HILL**
I kick you off the hill, it's now mine! ***IT IS MY HILL SUCKERS***

A sucker i am and i suck your claims off the hill.

**MY HILL AGAIN**

TANK.

MY HILL
MechJeb 2 Takes over your tank. It's now under my control. ***MY HILL***

I turn your tank into a terrarium to house my lizards. Then shrink the hill and put it inside so they can guard it.

**MY PLANET OF THE GIANTS HILL.**

The lizards grow and become lizozaurz. The ~~terrarium~~ hillarium is broken.

Free Lizozaur Hillarium.
I use Gru's Freeze Ray to freeze all the dinosaurs. ***M Y F R O Z E N H I L L***

The dinosaure got used to frost.

Cryosaurs Hill

I build new Hill.

My new Hill.

Your hill cries so much because it doesn't feel special that it shrinks away.

I take over Dr Evil's Volcanic floating Island base.

**MY FLOATING, VOLCANIC, SUPER COOL LAIR HILL.**

Plot twist: It's 1883 and your volcanic lair is Krakatau ([@JB182](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/210976-jb182/))

**KABLOOIE!**

MY HILL.
